tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS traffic_patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    data_usage INT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS usage_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    data_sent INT,
    data_received INT
);

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    bandwidth_used INT
)

CREATE TABLE Resource_Allocation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    allocated_bandwidth INT,
    usage_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Capacity_Planning (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    planning_id INT,
    network_type VARCHAR(50),
    capacity_needed INT
)

CREATE TABLE Usage_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    network_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_usage INT
)

CREATE TABLE Network_Resources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    capacity_available INT
)
